text: @CSIS #Ukraine #Russia #War #InternationalSecurity #SethGJones #EliotACohen #EmilyHarding #MichaelVickers #CSISTwo years since Russia's invasion of Ukraine - time for a battlefield update on the war. Join us for a virtual discussion with top experts, hosted by @CSIS. We'll dive into Ukrainian and Russian strategy, Western aid, and the future of this conflict. Don't miss it! 🌐💥
